txt.en:
Friend of King Elessar and Hero of Gondor,

The King desires you come to Minas Tirith to attend him on a matter of great import for the kingdom. He summons you to Minas Tirith (Midsummer) as soon as you are able to do so. He bids me tell you that although the war has ended, the hurts done by the forces of Sauron must be addressed, and to accomplish this he needs your capable help. Come see me outside the City Stables in Minas Tirith (Midsummer) and I will bring you to see the King.

Glindor, Herald of the King
Minas Tirith (Midsummer)
By the City Stables
